description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) queries system locale information during execution.(Citation: Ensilo Darkgate 2018) Later versions of [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) query GetSystemDefaultLCID for locale information to determine if the malware is executing in Russian-speaking countries.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023)

external_references.description: Adi Zeligson & Rotem Kerner. (2018, November 13). Enter The DarkGate - New Cryptocurrency Mining and Ransomware Campaign. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
